meanings.definition: The surgical removal of one or both gonads.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian performed a gonadectomy on the dog to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: After the gonadectomy, the cat's behavior changed as it no longer had the urge to mate.
meanings.sent3: The comedy sketch about a mix-up during a gonadectomy had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, a gonadectomy can be seen as pruning the tree of reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tiny scalpel used in the gonadectomy lingered in my mind long after the surgery.

meanings.definition: The procedure of sterilizing an animal by removing its reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The zoo performed a gonadectomy on the elephant to control its population.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often opt for gonadectomy to prevent their livestock from breeding uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a gonadectomy party for pets sounded bizarre but practical.
meanings.sent4: In the world of animal conservation, a gonadectomy is a powerful tool for population management.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the gonadectomy on the stray cat population was evident within months.
